features: 【15 RGB LIGHT MODES & LARGE SIZE】This extra-thick RGB gaming mouse pad features 11 static light modes and 4 dynamic modes, the light is bright but not deter from viewing the monitor. The size of 31.5x11.8 inches fit your mouse and keyboard perfectly and still have a large amount of movement space.

【PLUG AND PLAY & TOUCH CONTROL】Powered by USB and no driver required. Unlike traditional click button, touch control button means more sensitive and quicker switch action and you never need to worry about click life span.

【NANO-TEXTURED CLOTH SURFACE】Nano-textured surface is softer and more smooth over micro-textured cloth to allow for lightning-fast mouse moving while maintaining accurate control even during intense use.

【HIGH QUALITY】Made of high elasticity natural rubber, this mouse mat is non-toxic and has no hazardous substances, safe for use. Anti-slip base can firmly grip your desktop and nylon stitched edges make the pad much more durable and longer lasting. Easily roll up the mouse pad without getting wrinkless or creases.

【45-DAY MONEY BACK & LIFETIME GURANTEE】We Stand Behind Our Quality! If for any reason you are not entirely happy, CONTACT US directly, we will replace or return your order with no question asked. BUY WITH 100% CONFIDENCE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality Bright RGB
reviews.reviewText: I like this mousepadDoes everything a mousepad needs to do - it’s high quality, doesn’t get dirty easily, and the size is perfect. Currently I’m running a full sized keyboard, but I still have mouse enough room to play competitive games. Lights are nice and bright, I tend to bend my mousepad a lot, so far I haven’t been able to kink the RGB strip.I can’t think of anything I could critique it on, it’s perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Very nice product. The lighting is better than I expected and has quite a few selections which would fit just about any scheme you are looking for. Breathing/color-changing modes are limited but still very nice. Feel is good and it's easy to clean as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Mouse pad is great as a very large padded area and continues to light up and the lights do not dull out. The mouse pad also has multiple different colored features which is really nice as they stay very vibrant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product and very affordable. The led works well and is easy to connect. Its perfect for your laptop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Packaged good. Unrolled and it unrolled nicely. No fold creases so that was a plus. I'm the lights around it those smoothed out nicely. Colors were bright and cool looking, on the far side they were a tad dimmer but not by much really. For the price definitely happy. Will update if it breaks or does not work. My son is going to be beyond excited when he opens everything up starting with this to give a subtle hint that the gaming computer is next haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good, great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Wasn't sure about the quality or looks of this pad because of it's price, but I'm on a budget now and wanted a decent looking accessory to go with my system. This pad did not disappoint, and I think you will like it too. It has a decent selection of light patterns to choose from and a non-slip coating underneath which holds in place nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From Envelope Exile to RGB Oasis: My Ode to Fullpad's LED Mousepad
reviews.reviewText: My workspace used to be a cardboard wasteland. My trusty UPS envelope, once a valiant makeshift mousepad, was crumbling under the weight of epic spreadsheet battles and late-night coding marathons. I knew I needed an upgrade, but little did I expect to find transcendent mouse-gliding nirvana in the form of Fullpad's LED mousepad.This pad isn't just a surface, it's an expansive canvas for cursor-commanding excellence. It covers most of my desk, banishing the fear of the dreaded "mouse-off-the-edge" abyss. The fabric is a dreamy, buttery-smooth haven for my fingertips, gliding effortlessly under every click and scroll.But the magic doesn't stop there. The RGB lighting is like a disco party for my peripherals, pulsing and swirling in a symphony of color. I synced it with my mouse, and now my desk looks like a cyberpunk dreamscape straight out of Blade Runner. Talk about aesthetics on overdrive!Forget those boring freebies from the dentist (who needs flossing demos anyway?). This pad is a statement piece, a declaration that I'm a grown-up who appreciates quality and doesn't settle for subpar desk real estate.So, if you're tired of cardboard crumbs and dull desk vibes, ditch the envelope and embrace the RGB revolution. Fullpad's LED mousepad is more than just a mousepad, it's an experience. It's a level-up for your workspace, a gliding upgrade for your cursor, and a visual feast for your eyes. Trust me, your productivity (and your desk) will thank you.
